interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie [Special Edition]
Review Date: 2016/02/26
Store: Steve Blum  (Actor),     Beau Billingslea  (Actor),     Shinichiro Watanabe  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Anime
Product Description: ['Mars. Days before Halloween 2071. Villains blow up a tanker truck on Highway One, releasing a deadly virus that kills hundreds. Fearing a bigger, even more devastating biochemical attack, an astronomical reward is offered for the arrest and capture of the person behind the destruction. On the spaceship "Bebop," Spike Spiegel and his crew of bounty hunters (Jet Black, Faye Valentine, Ed and Ein) are bored and short of cash. But with the news of the reward everything changes. Based on the wildly popular TV series, Cowboy Bebop, the big-screen smash COWBOY BEBOP: THE MOVIE pits Spike and Co. against their deadliest adversary ever. Featuring stunning, state-of-the-art animation, this action-packed sci-fi adventure builds to a breath-taking, nail-biting climax, guaranteed to keep you hanging on the edge of your seat.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Anime & Manga', 'Format': 'Dolby, Special Edition, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Beau Billingslea, Shinichiro Watanabe, Steve Blum', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 56 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '6857', 'Director': 'Shinichiro Watanabe', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, Special Edition, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 56 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 7, 2010', 'Actors': 'Steve Blum, Beau Billingslea', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Image Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: If you are into the BeBop series...this is a great movie.  I had not watched the series, but my teens liked it.  I watched the movie and enjoyed it without having the background.  Nice story line.
Review Title: this is a great movie. I had not watched the series
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
America: Imagine a World without Her
John Sullivan  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Lionsgate Home Entertainment, All Lionsgate Titles
["The new film from the creators of 2016: OBAMA'S AMERICA takes America's critics at face value and imagines a world in which she never existed. Today that notion of the essential goodness of America is under attack, replaced by another story in which theft and plunder are seen as the defining features of American history--from the theft of Native American and Mexican lands and the exploitation of African labor to a contemporary foreign policy said to be based on stealing oil and a capitalist system that robs people of their 'fair share.' Gerald Molen, the Academy Award-winning producer of SCHINDLER'S LIST, Dinesh D'Souza, the New York Times best-selling author and creator of 2016, and director John Sullivan invite you on a journey of discovery that will bring you face-to-face with America's most compelling contemporary critics along with the heroes who built America, in the times in which they lived, bled, and sacrificed in order to build a great nation. You'll be there as Christopher C"]

Important video and TRUTH for our time.  Makes ya proud.
Five Stars
The Last Airbender
Noah Ringer  (Actor),     Nicola Peltz  (Actor),     M. Night Shyamalan  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['Experience the thrilling live-action adventure based on the hit Nickelodeon series', 'Avatar: The Last Airbender', '. Join Aang, an extraordinary boy with incredible “bending” powers, as he journeys through an exotic land filled with magical creatures and powerful friends. As the Avatar, he is the only one who can end the age-old conflict between the four nations: Air, Water, Earth and Fire. An inspirational journey,', 'The Last Airbender', 'is exciting entertainment for the entire family!']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 0.7 x 5.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'M. Night Shyamalan', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Run time': '1 hour and 43 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 16, 2010', 'Actors': 'Noah Ringer, Nicola Peltz, Dev Patel, Jackson Rathbone, Shaun Toub', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Addicting storyline.  Great adaptation from the TV series.  Hard to take an entire season and condense it into 2 hours.  They hit all the high points and we are looking forward to the rest of the trilogy and hope it is produced.  Amazing scenery.  Great acting. That ice castle...I mean WOW.  The special effects are incredible.  Highly recommend.
Great Movie....My family loved it.
The Collected Works of Hayao Miyazaki (Amazon Exclusive)

An awesome collection.  My children have most of these in a hodge podge of places.  This set has them all in one place and a few selection we did not have.  Beautiful.  Nice addition to our Studio Ghibli collection..
WOW!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Consumption Preferences:** Enjoys thought-provoking documentaries and films that challenge mainstream narratives, especially regarding American history and identity. Values family-friendly adventure films with engaging storylines and appreciates curated animated collections that enhance family viewing experiences. Recently expressed interest in anime with strong storytelling.

- **Values:** Exhibits a strong appreciation for patriotic themes and narratives that highlight American virtues, indicating a preference for content that fosters national pride and positive representations of the country, alongside a love for universally adored animated films with moral and imaginative depth.

- **Review Behavior:** Regularly provides high ratings (5.0) for content aligned with personal values and engages positively with diverse genres. Recently praised an animated film collection for enhancing family engagement, and enjoyed an animated film independently of its series, indicating openness to exploration within related genres.

- **Engagement Style:** Displays enthusiasm for content through positive and affirming reviews, often emphasizing storytelling, visuals, and overall presentation quality.

- **Interest in Historical Contexts:** Continues to demonstrate a passion for exploring historical events and figures with a focus on redefining American history, while embracing enchanting stories that emphasize adventure and family values.

Overall, this user is engaged with content that aligns with a patriotic viewpoint, emphasizes positivity, showcases strong narratives across different genres, and embraces both historical themes and delightful animated adventures, including a newfound appreciation for anime storytelling.
